specifications.Characteristics: Yarn Effect > Slub Slub yarn is made with varying thicknesses, causing the fabric to have a bumpy texture. It adds a unique texture and character to the fabric's surface.
specifications.Care Advice: Knit When you receive a knit product, it may be stiff and wrinkled. This is because the fabric has been folded and compressed for shipping. To soften and straighten the fabric, you should condition it for 2-3 days at room temperature before using it.
specifications.Care Instructions: Machine wash cold / Gentle Wash with similar colors Turn inside out before washing Do not bleach Line dry Do not tumble dry Do not iron Sustainability Certification > BCI The Better Cotton Initiative is a global, not-for-profit organization, which is the largest cotton sustainability program in the world. BCI aims to transform cotton production worldwide by introducing sustainable best practices in the initial stage of its production. Recommended Use T-shirts
